info.description: seven.io offers you the possibility to send SMS, RCS, text-to-speech messages, perform home register lookups, mobile number portability status lookups, phone number formats and much more.
info.title: seven

country.description: The country the entries refer to.

date.description: The date the entries refer to.

label.description: The label the entries refer to.

account.description: The AnalyticsByLabel the entries refer to.

get.description: Retrieves the account balance for given API key

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact for deletion.

delete.description: Delete a contact by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact for retrieval.

get.description: Retrieves a contact by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the contact for deletion.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the group for deletion.

delete_contacts.description: Specifies whether the contacts who are members of this group should also be deleted.

delete.description: Delete a group by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the group for retrieval.

get.description: Retrieves a group by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the group for updating.

id.description: The ID of the webhook you want to delete.

delete.description: Deletes a hook by its ID.

get.description: Query the active webhooks of your account.

headers.description: Custom headers to be sent to the webhook URL. Could contain multiple headers separated by a line break.

event_type.description: Type of event for which you would like to receive a webhook.

event_filter.description: Sends the webhook only if the filter applies. For example, for different webhooks with different inbound numbers.

request_method.description: Request method in which you would like to receive the webhook.

mccmnc.description: The mobile country code / mobile network code.

label.description: The label used for this message.

foreign_id.description: The foreign ID used for this message.

get.description: Retrieves outbound journals for the associated API key
Retrieves inbound journals for the associated API key
Retrieves message replies for the associated API key
Retrieves voice calls for the associated API key

number.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard in a human readable format.

international_formatted.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard in a human readable format.

country_name.description: The full english name if the number belonging country.

country_code.description: The area code of the number belonging country. This value is numeric.

success.description: Determines if the request was successful.,

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The phone number to look up

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The phone number to delete.

delete_immediately.description: If set to true, the number will be deleted immediately. If set to false, the number will be deleted at the end of the current billing period.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The phone number to retrieve.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The phone number to update details for.

friendly_name.description: The updated friendly name for the number.

sms_forward.description: The phone number to forward incoming SMS to. If empty, incoming SMS won't be forwarded by SMS.

email_forward.description: The email address to forward incoming SMS to. If empty, incoming SMS won't be forwarded by email.

slack_forward.description: The Slack webhook URL to forward incoming SMS to. If empty, incoming SMS won't be forwarded by Slack.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the country to search for available numbers in.

parameters.name: features_sms
parameters.description: If set to true, only numbers that support SMS will be returned.

parameters.name: features_a2p_sms
parameters.description: If set to true, only numbers that support A2P SMS will be returned.

parameters.name: features_voice
parameters.description: If set to true, only numbers that support voice will be returned.

payment_interval.description: The payment interval for the number. Possible values are monthly and annually (default).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The countries ISO code to get pricing for. Example values are "de" for Germany or "fr" for France. Omit to show pricing for all channels.

countCountries.description: The number if countries in total.

comment.description: Any information which might be of interest.

features.description: The features supported by this network.

networkName.description: The full name of the carrier.

get.description: Retrieves pricing information for a single country or all

msg_id.description: The ID of the received RCS to which you want to send the event. If not specified, the event is automatically sent to the last RCS message received.

to.description: The phone number to which you want to send the event.

post.description: Trigger a Rich Content Message event

text.description: The actual text message to send

foreign_id.description: Identifier to return in callbacks for status reports etc.

label.description: A custom label for sorting analytics

delay.description: Date/Time for delayed dispatch - expects a timestamp "1141511104" or date time "2016-03-04 23:25:04"

performance_tracking.description: Enable performance tracking for found URLs

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The message ID for deletion

delete.description: Delete a scheduled Rich Content Message

ids.description: A list of the SMS to be deleted. Enter the respective id's of the SMS to be deleted here.
ids.x-ms-summary: A list of the SMS to be deleted. Enter the respective id's of the SMS to be deleted here.

delete.description: Delete one or more SMS messages before they have been sent to prevent them from being sent.

text.description: The actual text message to send - may not exceed 1520 characters

to.description: The recipient number(s) or contact/group name(s) - separate multiple recipients by comma

from.description: A custom sender name. A maximum of 11 alphanumeric or 16 numeric characters

foreign_id.description: Identifier to return in callbacks for status reports etc.

label.description: A custom label for sorting analytics

udh.description: A custom user data deader - if set and message contains hex code, the message gets sent as 8-bit binary

delay.description: Date/Time for delayed dispatch - expects a timestamp "1141511104" or date time "2016-03-04 23:25:04"

flash.description: Send as flash SMS which appears directly on the recipients screen

performance_tracking.description: Enable performance tracking for found URLs

post.description: Sends one or multiple SMS to one or multiple recipients

parameters.name: msg_id
parameters.description: A comma separated list of SMS IDs to check

get.description: Retrieves dispatch status for given SMS IDs

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a subaccount. This will give you only the data for a specific subaccount.

get.description: Request a list of all subaccounts of an account.

name.description: Full first and last name of the account owner.

threshold.description: The credit threshold, below which credit should be transferred.

amount.description: The amount of credit that should be sent from the main account to the subaccount when threshold is reached.

post.description: With this API, you can configure the automatic credit transfer for a subaccount. This can transfer credit from the main account to the subaccount when a set threshold is reached. To deactivate, simply set amount to 0.
With this API, you can transfer credit from the main account to the subaccount once.
With this API, subaccounts can be deleted based on their ID.

number.description: The number to validate for usage with the Voice API

callback.description: The optional callback URL to query right after validation

post.description: Validates the given phone number for the use of voice API

to.description: The message receiver - must be a valid phone number or contact from the address book

text.description: The text to convert to a voice message - accepts valid TwiML too

ringtime.description: The duration of the ringing until the phone is hung up.

from.description: Sets the sender - must be a verified sender - use an inbound number of yours or one of ours.

foreign_id.description: A unique ID that you can use for later assignment of the call. This ID is passed in the webhook events.

post.description: Sends a text-to-speech message to a given recipient number

parameters.name: call_id
parameters.description: The ID of the call to be ended

post.description: This endpoint ends an active call. Only calls with the status in-progress can be ended.
Sends a WhatsApp message via the WhatsApp Business API. Supports template messages, free text messages within active conversations, and delayed dispatch.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the message to delete.

delete.description: Deletes a scheduled WhatsApp message. Only messages that have not yet been sent can be deleted. WhatsApp does not support message revocation.

requestBody.description: The event to send. At least one of "to" or "msg_id" must be provided.

post.description: Triggers a WhatsApp event such as a read receipt or typing indicator.

externalDocs.description: Retrieve the status for a sent SMS with the given ID
Validate caller ID for voice Voice API
Issue voice call to phone number
Get number format, CNAM,- HLR- or MNP information for given phone number
Explore detailed documentation on utilizing our Phone Number Management API for comprehensive control over searching, booking, and managing your communication channels' phone numbers.
Contacts are a central part of seven. You can use to manage contacts programmatically. We'll look at how you can query, create, update and delete contacts.
You can query, create, update and delete groups.
Create, delete, retrieve information, and transfer balance. Ideal for those who want to manage their account structure clearly and efficiently.
You can create, view and delete webhooks via this endpoint.
Endpoints for the WhatsApp Business API.
Endpoints regarding insights for sent/received messages.
Find out more about the seven.io SMS gateway.

analyticsEnd.name: end
analyticsEnd.description: End date of the statistics. Defaults to the current day.

analyticsStart.name: start
analyticsStart.description: Start date of the statistics in the format YYYY-MM-DD. By default, the date of 30 days ago is set.

analyticsLabel.name: label
analyticsLabel.description: Shows only data of a specific label.

analyticsSubaccounts.name: subaccounts
analyticsSubaccounts.description: Receive the data only for the main account, all your (sub-)accounts or only for specific subaccounts.

journalDateFrom.name: date_from
journalDateFrom.description: A start date from which the search should start

journalDateTo.name: date_to
journalDateTo.description: An end date up to which the search is to be performed

journalTo.name: to
journalTo.description: The receivers phone number in any format.

journalState.name: state
journalState.description: The status of the message. - could be e.g. completed / failed for Voice or DELIVERED / NOTDELIVERED etc. for SMS

journalLimit.name: limit
journalLimit.description: Limits the number of entries to be returned.

journalOffset.name: offset
journalOffset.description: Starting point from which entries are to be queried.

lookupNumber.name: number
lookupNumber.description: The phone number to look up

firstname.description: The first name of a contact

home_number.description: The home number of a contact

lastname.description: The last name of a contact

mobile_number.description: The mobile number of a contact

postal_code.description: The postal code of a contact

sms.description: The amount of outgoing SMS for this day.

rcs.description: The amount of  RCS messages for this day.

voice.description: The amount of voice calls for this day.

hlr.description: The amount of HLR lookups for this day.

mnp.description: The amount of MNP lookups for this day.

inbound.description: The amount of inbound messages for this day.

usage_eur.description: The total costs for this day.

success.description: Determines if the request was successful.,

international.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard.

international_formatted.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard in a human readable format.

national.description: The number in a domestic number format.

country_iso.description: The two digit ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

country_name.description: The full english name if the number belonging country.

country_code.description: The area code of the number belonging country. This value is numeric.

type.description: The message type. Required for structured messages. Omit for simple freetext messages using the "text" parameter.

template.description: The template name. Required when type is "template".

language.description: The language code for the template (e.g. "de", "en"). Required when type is "template".

text.description: The free text message content. Used for non-template messages within an active conversation.

delay.description: Date/Time for delayed dispatch - expects a date time like "2026-02-10 09:00:00" or a Unix timestamp.

label.description: A custom label for sorting analytics.

foreign_id.description: Identifier to return in callbacks for status reports etc.

ttl.description: Time to live in minutes for the message.

performance_tracking.description: Enable performance tracking for found URLs.

url.description: Public URL of the media file. Required for image, video, audio, document, and sticker types.

caption.description: Caption for the media file. Optional for image, video, and document types.

filename.description: Filename for the document. Required when type is "document".

latitude.description: Latitude of the location. Required when type is "location".

longitude.description: Longitude of the location. Required when type is "location".

name.description: Name of the location. Optional when type is "location".

address.description: Address of the location. Optional when type is "location".

contacts.description: Contact cards to send. Required when type is "contacts".

interactive_type.description: Sub-type for interactive messages. Required when type is "interactive".

buttons.description: Buttons for interactive button messages. Max 3 buttons.

button_text.description: Button text for interactive list messages.

WabaTemplateComponents.description: Template components for parameter substitution. Values are positional and replace {{1}}, {{2}}, etc. in the template.

header.description: Positional parameters for the template header.

body.description: Positional parameters for the template body.

WabaEventRequest.description: At least one of "to" or "msg_id" must be provided to identify the target conversation or message. For reaction events, only "message_id" and "emoji" are required.

from.description: The WhatsApp sender number. Not used for reaction events.

to.description: The recipient phone number. Not used for reaction events. At least one of "to" or "msg_id" must be provided.

msg_id.description: The ID of the message to which the event refers. At least one of "to" or "msg_id" must be provided.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to react to. Required when event is "reaction".

emoji.description: Emoji for the reaction. Required when event is "reaction".

success.description: The API status code as a string (e.g. "100" for success). Not to be confused with the boolean success field in individual message objects.
